label: ABC2_mP16_14_e_e_2e-003
title: KNO$_{2}$ III Structure
comments:
This is {\em not} the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_mC8_8_a_a_b-001}{KNO$_{2}$ structure found by (Ziegler, 1936)} and given the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $F5_{11}$.  That structure is now considered obsolete. 
 We use the data take by (Onada, 1998) at 4K. Phase III is stable up to 264K. Above this temperature it transforms to the rhombohedral phase II, which has disordered NO$_{2}^{-}$ ions 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_mP16_14_e_e_2e-003}{KNO$_{2}$ (III)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_mP16_14_e_e_2e-004}{manganite (MnOOH)}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_mP16_14_e_e_2e-005}{$\beta$-LiErO$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW label, ABC2\_mP16\_14\_e\_e\_2e. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
